tool_description: Creates and manages A/B tests for review widgets to optimize conversion rates and user engagement through variant testing.

test_name.description: Name identifier for the A/B test

variant_a_config.description: Configuration JSON string for variant A

variant_b_config.description: Configuration JSON string for variant B

traffic_split_percent.description: Percentage of traffic for variant B (10-90)

success_metric.description: Primary success metric: click_rate, conversion_rate, or engagement_time

error_messages: Invalid variant configuration: Variant config JSON is malformed or contains invalid parameters.
Invalid traffic_split_percent: Must be between 10 and 90 percent.
Invalid test_duration_days: Must be between 1 and 90 days.
Invalid success_metric: Use one of [click_rate, conversion_rate, engagement_time].
Test name already exists: Choose a unique test name.
usage: Provide test_name and configuration JSON for both variants. Set traffic distribution and test duration parameters to run the A/B test.

test_id.description: Unique identifier for the created A/B test

test_status.description: Current test status: active, paused, completed, or failed

variant_a_performance.description: Performance metric value for variant A

variant_b_performance.description: Performance metric value for variant B

statistical_significance.description: Whether the test results are statistically significant
